full_threads.body: NDC - Homepage Slider Update

Hi Stuart, 


We have added the video banner to the home page and the Invisalign pages: 


https://www.nationaldentalcare.com.au/
https://www.nationaldentalcare.com.au/invisalign/


Please review and let us know if you would like any further changes. 


Thanks,

Hi Stuart, 


We have added the video banner to the home page and the Invisalign pages: 


https://www.nationaldentalcare.com.au/
https://www.nationaldentalcare.com.au/invisalign/


Please review and let us know if you would like any further changes. 


Thanks,
Manuel Manceli Thanks I will send it to the client for review.
Heath Maguire  please check the live site https://www.nationaldentalcare.com.au/

Manuel Manceli On this page: https://staging-nationaldentalcare.kinsta.com/ we have a slider that has a video it in. Can you please ADD it to the home page slider on the live site? You will need to login to the staging site to see how it is configured in the Revolution Slider plugin, username: support / password: llx8Q$O7HgpTRvJvOj)ZxhAa 


I'm heading to a client meeting now, so can you please ask Joel Maligalig if you have any questions or need some help? 


Thanks!
NDC - Homepage Slider Update

Hi Stuart, 


Sure we will work on this today for you. 


Thanks and speak soon,

Morning Heath,




Just heard back from NDC on the homepage banner we worked on the last weeks.




Can we make the video banner live and also re-purpose it on this landing page? (https://www.nationaldentalcare.com.au/invisalign/)




The URL for the button/ "Book Online" call to action should be https://www.nationaldentalcare.com.au/claim-your-free-consult-invisalign/




Any questions give me a buzz.



Cheers,


Stuart


0434043385

Morning Heath,




Just revisiting the original video plugin updates as per the below as last week got away from me on some tasks.




I've told NDC to slow down the video to their liking on the hosting side via Vimeo, and have just logged into staging to change the video to another one they wanted to view.


If we need any assistance on this still I'll reach out, most likely when we need to push it live and some URL updates etc.




Cheers,
Stuart




Stuart Halley
Head of Performance


P: 1300 660 285 · M: 0434 043 385


Level 13, 333 George St, Sydney NSW

Hi Stuart, 


Sure we have added in the video for you. And yes you know the preferred answer haha - definitely in the video. The less grunt work this site has to do, the better. 


https://staging-nationaldentalcare.kinsta.com/  


Thanks and speak soon,

Thanks Heath,


Looks good to me. The client is wondering a few things:


Can they see what it looks like with this video instead? (https://vimeo.com/282235699)


Is it possible to slow down the video playback from the Slider Revolution or best to do that from the video upload itself? (think I know the preferred answer to this one)


Cheers,
Stuart


https://cbo.me/images/logo.png


Stuart Halley
Head of Performance


P: 1300 660 285 · M: 0434 043 385


Level 13, 333 George St, Sydney NSW


From: Heath from WP Perk <heath@wpperk.com>
Sent: Monday, 30 July 2018 2:08 PM
To: stuart@cbo.me
Subject: Re: NDC - Homepage Slider Update


Hi Stuart,


Here is a link to the draft for you to check out: https://staging-nationaldentalcare.kinsta.com/


A couple of things to note:


· The button is not linked as yet (we will make sure it is on the live site)


· The video is grainy as you will see


· The video needs to be set to loop in the embed options


Let me know what you think? Thanks and speak soon,

Hi Stuart, 


Here is a link to the draft for you to check out: https://staging-nationaldentalcare.kinsta.com/ 


A couple of things to note:



  • The button is not linked as yet (we will make sure it is on the live site)

  • The video is grainy as you will see

  • The video needs to be set to loop in the embed options 


Let me know what you think? Thanks and speak soon,

Ok thanks Stuart, we will work on this and get a draft over to you. 


Speak soon,

Morning Heath,




Just recapping the video slider as I had some feedback to the client on how it looked. The client is keen to update the video since it doesn't look great in a responsive design, and ideally overlay text by use of layers in the Slider Revolution plugin instead of having it embedded in the video itself.




Are you able to help us update the slider with the below video link and text?





  • https://vimeo.com/user80357861/review/281553653/3c534953aa



  • 281553653 is the Vimeo video ID



  • Text Overlay/ Wording:



  • See the difference with Invisalign®

  • Claim your free consult now

  • [Book Online] call to action button


If we could see how this look in the staging site first that would be great.




Let me know if this doesn't make sense.




Cheers,


Stuart


0434043385

Ok cool! Thanks Stuart. On standby. 


Speak soon

Thanks Heath,


Sorry am just on a call.


You’re email didn’t make it through but thanks for sharing. I’ll run this past NDC but my consensus is to change it, as the scaling/ resolution looks odd with the responsive design.


I’ll get back to you ASAP.


Cheers,
Stu


https://cbo.me/images/logo.png

Ok here is a link to the staging site: https://staging-nationaldentalcare.kinsta.com/ for you to check the new slider. Let me know when/if you want us to push this to live? 


Thanks and speak soon,

Also let me know when you're free for a catch-up, a I have a few clients who are looking for some website projects that I can introduce you too.

NDC - Homepage Slider Update

Just trying to hunt down the appropriate files. Leave it with me. Won't be too long. 


Thanks,

Sorry for the update, but is there any way that we can push the requested update to a non-published staging page as opposed to pushing it live?




Regards,


Stuart Halley


0434043385

Hi All,


Hope everyone is well and had a great weekend.


Nationaldentalcare.com.au have a new slider that they want to put live on the homepage. Are you able to update the homepage with the "Homepage Slider 2" slide from the Slider Revolution plugin?


Regards,

Stuart
